explains: adj. 被识别的；经鉴定的；被认同的
v. 鉴定；辨认（identify 的过去式和过去分词）
wordGroup: identified by 由…鉴定；以…鉴别
be identified with 被视为与…等同；以…著名

sentences.en: The gene for asthma has been identified.
sentences.cn: 哮喘病的基因已被识别。

sentences.en: Police have already identified 10 murder suspects.
sentences.cn: 警方已经确认了10名谋杀嫌疑犯。

sentences.en: The company has identified 60 potential customers.
sentences.cn: 该公司已确定了60位潜在的客户。
